name: Schade et al., Appellants, v. Millcreek Township School District
name_abbreviation: Schade v. Millcreek Township School District

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
parties: Schade et al., Appellants, v. Millcreek Township School District.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
Orders affirmed. Costs on appellants.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: James R. Waidley, with him James F. Toohey, for appellants.

Conrad A. Pearson, with him William W. Knox, and Knox, Weber, Pearson & McLaughlin, School District Solicitors, James W. Evans, Township Solicitor, and Lindley R. McClelland, County Solicitor, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Schade et al., Appellants, v. Millcreek Township School District.
Argued October 7, 1963.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
James R. Waidley, with him James F. Toohey, for appellants.
Conrad A. Pearson, with him William W. Knox, and Knox, Weber, Pearson & McLaughlin, School District Solicitors, James W. Evans, Township Solicitor, and Lindley R. McClelland, County Solicitor, for appellees.
November 12, 1963:
